Traditional Milk Tea.name: Traditional Milk Tea
Traditional Milk Tea.reviewDesc: The best milk tea on the ave. Not too sweet, but super flavorful!

Paneer Burger.name: Paneer Burger
Paneer Burger.reviewDesc: Such a good fusion place at a cheap price! Highly recommend.

Beef Pho.name: Beef Pho
Beef Pho.reviewDesc: The service here is so fast and the food is just as satisfying!

Aladdin's Fries.name: Aladdin's Fries
Aladdin's Fries.address: Aladdin Gyro-Cery & Deli, 4139 University Wy NE, Seattle, WA 98105
Aladdin's Fries.reviewDesc: One of the best fries in the U-District! The staff is really friendly and they're always open late, which is a plus. The mix of beef and lamb is really superior. Plus it's pretty affordable!

randomryan.reviewDesc: This one's pretty good, but I prefer the other Aladdin's location closer to the old Target. There's a difference!

madeupmarushka.reviewDesc: Love this place, and love this meal!

totallyrealrachel.reviewDesc: The tzaziki sauce is a little too sour for me, but the meat itself is well-seasoned! Overall pretty yummy!

Black Milk Tea.name: Black Milk Tea
Black Milk Tea.reviewDesc: I love TP tea! The black tea is really great for when you're craving a sweet treat.

Salmon and Ahi Poke Bowl.name: Salmon and Ahi Poke Bowl
Salmon and Ahi Poke Bowl.reviewDesc: I love how customizable and cheap this place is! They pack their servings which is definitely worth the price.

Chocolate and Vanilla Ice Cream Combo.name: Chocolate and Vanilla Ice Cream Combo
Chocolate and Vanilla Ice Cream Combo.reviewDesc: One of my favorites at Sweet Alchemy. You can never go wrong with chocolate and vanilla!

Chicken Rice Bowl and Kimchi Mac Salad C.name: Chicken Rice Bowl and Kimchi Mac Salad Combo
Chicken Rice Bowl and Kimchi Mac Salad C.reviewDesc: This bowl is actually so filling and so tasty!

Pollo Burrito.name: Pollo Burrito
Pollo Burrito.reviewDesc: Pretty decent, but kind of expensive! Still really yummy.

Cumin Lamb Biang Noodles.name: Cumin Lamb Biang Noodles
Cumin Lamb Biang Noodles.reviewDesc: These noodles are hand pulled and its amazing! Really authentic and delicious!

Banh Mi Bowl.name: Banh Mi Bowl
Banh Mi Bowl.reviewDesc: Some of the best banh mis in U-District. Really filling too!
